Title: The Devil You Know
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Taylor Elmore, Elmore Leonard (based on the short story 'Fire in the Hole' by), Nichelle D. Tramble (executive story editor), Ingrid Escajeda (story editor), Ryan Farley (story editor), Jon Worley (story editor)
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Joelle Carter, Jacob Pitts
Plot: A prison guard springs Dickie and Dewey from prison in an attempt to get his hands on Mags' secret fortune, while Robert Quarles offers Devil a shot at becoming a boss if he betrays Boyd.
